climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: 5-Layer Face Mask : WWDOLL 5-ply KN95 face mask is protective and high filter efficiency. The outermost 1 layer non-woven fabric can filter large particles, middle 2-layer melt-blown fabric can block more than 95% particles, 1 layer hot air cotton can filter pm2.5 and the innermost 1 layer non-woven fabric is skin-friendly and softer that give you the comfortable usage experience at the same time it protects your breath with high filter efficiency.

3D Design : The 3D shape of KN95 mask is designed according to the human face shape to ensure the tightness, to fit the human face, to increase the breathing volume when use the face mask. Our WWDOLL breathable face mask KN95 can greatly improve the permeability, and to make wearing and exhaling more comfortable

Powerful Protective Barrier : Not easy to drop, no need to adjust it when you work. Softer elastic ear loop design of the KN95 face mask helps eliminate pressure on the ears for comfortable experience. Adjustable nose clip design can help the mask perfectly attach onto your face. The sides join tightly to the face; Hence, the protective mask KN95 avoids unfiltered air directly entering into.

Anti Fall Design : The metal nose clip is fixed to the inner of the mask. you never need to worry about the Inserted nose clip falling off, and the flexible metal allows you to adjust the mask tightly fits your face
Disclaimer : This KN95 mask is NOT an N95 mask. For more information about KN95 masks please see the following before you purchase: amazon.com/AboutKN95s

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These masks are wonderful. We previously purchased some that had the same length listed for the ear loops. However, the previous ones were tight, hurt my ears, and usually popped off my ears every time I talked. These are much better though. The mask fits great on my face, and the ear loops are just a bit more flexible than others, allowing a more comfortable fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My FAVE black mask...fits face well, comfy!!
reviews.reviewText: I really have been enjoying this style more than I expected.Nose bridge holds very securely and does not have such flimsy metal as in the other types.I feel that I’m able to breathe more easily with a stiff shaped mask of this nature and at first did not realize I would prefer it to the other styles as I had worked in surgical nursing and I have never tried this shape before.The ear loop elastic is very thick and comfortable and I find for me it’s sized more appropriately it’s not so loose like the others.They look a bit more sort of minimalist clean lined and in my opinion slightly more fashionable than the folded flat types. And it holds tighter to the face and feels more protective to me than the cloth ones despite the statistics...I feel they are high enough quality rating for wearing out to walk my dog to the bathroom etc. and to out on short errands and more. They can be reused and sterilized or disposed of if you prefer.They seem thick enough and good quality enough to sterilize and reuse a number of times...If you have sensitive skin, I can say as someone who has skin problems, I have not had any issues with breakouts etc.Overall my new favorite conical mask!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but ear straps too tight
reviews.reviewText: Edit: I found that if I twist the straps once around a soda can, it stretches them just enough to be comfortable. Don’t even have to leave it around the can long for it to work, probably less than half an hour. They don’t shrink back either. Kind of annoying to have to do but it’s quick and easy enough so at least I can use these instead of having to order more.I was looking for KN95 masks because the ear loops are more convenient than the over-the-head straps on the N95 masks. I saw that the WWDOLL brand was on the FDA’s emergency use authorization (EUA) list and is being sold on Amazon directly, not by a third-party seller. They're good quality and I like the black color.The only issue is that the ear loops are way too short. They pull on my ears and make them stick out. After an hour or so of wearing the mask, the backs of my ears start to hurt. I'm a woman and have a fairly petite head. I can only imagine how uncomfortable these would be to wear for a man or someone with a larger head. With longer straps you can twist them or tie knots on the end or put the little rubber adjusters on, but with short straps there's really nothing you can do. Maybe I'll try wrapping them around something for a few days to see if that will stretch them out enough. But really I'll probably just look for another brand. Glad I only got the box of 25.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As comfortable as you can get with this type of mask. If you’re looking for the high end mask post-COVID this is it. It’s been used by family during and post epidemic.Not going to get into the mask, out any other COVID, debate. This was the 95 mask family members like best.* For Air Travel whatever you believe.Planes dry you out. This mask keeps moisture trapped in. So when you breathe in the air is more comfortable. It’s always good to stay hydrated on plane.This is not about safety or anything other than wearing any mask on a plane makes for a more comfortable ride.Don’t care what you do or don’t believe. Just sharing the experience of several people who’ve flown. Especially long flights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Black Masks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite face masks
reviews.reviewText: At first these face masks didn't seem as sturdy as others I had worn, the ear straps would break more often, but as I bought more, either I have gotten gentler with my usage, or they have been built stronger, but these are my go to masks. Each box comes with a 25 masks and the price is a great a value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great fit for those of us with small faces.
reviews.reviewText: I really like these masks. They don't hurt my ears and hold up well. I'm a petite adult woman with a smallish face and find a lot of masks a bit big. If you have a bigger face/head, you probably wouldn't like them. They would also probably be good for tweens and teens. My husband can wear them but they are kind of tight on him. Like they might dig in a little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The elastics are too tight around the ears, not comfortable for long wear
